or if you'd like to support me, buy the e-book on amazon.

I'm Tim, a dutch programmer and creator of silly things.
I'm the author of the webcomic Consolia.

Last year i've published my very first book: My name is 404,
a kids book that's played out entirely in the world of the internet.

I'm currently working full time as a back-end developer
while working on my second book and drawing logos and merch freelance.

Want to contact me?

I'd love to hear from you. Whether it's weird questions, silly remarks, funny insults, or commissions of any of the aforementioned adjectives; all equally loved.

Reach me at tim@consolia-comic.com or use the twitters @timquax.
